original_text: Over the herds that pastured in Sharon was Shitrai the Sharonite; over the herds in the valleys was Shaphat the son of Adlai.
korean_text: 사론 사람 시드래는 사론에서 먹이는 소 떼를 맡았고 아들래의 아들 사밧은 골짜기에 있는 소 떼를 맡았고

sentences.original_text: Over the herds that pastured in Sharon
over the herds in the valleys
was Shaphat the son of Adlai
